people_also_ask.heading: Type of Villain Donkey Kong, also known as Donkey Kong Sr., is the titular main antagonist of the Donkey Kong arcade games, serving as the titular main antagonist of Donkey Kong and Donkey Kong 3, and the deuteragonist of Donkey Kong Jr. He later appears as Cranky Kong in the Donkey Kong franchise.

knowledge_panel.description: donkey kong is a video game series created by shigeru miyamoto. it features the adventures of an ape named donkey kong and his clan of other apes and monkeys. the franchise primarily consists of platform games, originally single-screen action puzzle games and later side-scrolling platformers. wikipedia
